docket_entries.description: Voluntary Petition (Chapter 11). Order for Relief Entered.Neviot Realty Holdings, LLC Chapter 11 Current Monthly Income Form 22B Due 2/25/2010. Schedule A due 2/25/2010. Schedule B due 2/25/2010. Schedule C due 2/25/2010. Schedule D due 2/25/2010. Schedule E due 2/25/2010. Schedule F due 2/25/2010. Schedule G due 2/25/2010. Schedule H due 2/25/2010. Schedule I due 2/25/2010. Schedule J due 2/25/2010. Summary of schedules - Page 1 due 2/25/2010. Summary of schedules - Page 2 (Statistical Summary) due 2/25/2010. Statement of Financial Affairs due 2/25/2010. Statement of Operations Due: 2/25/2010. 20 Largest Unsecured Creditors due 2/25/2010. Balance Sheet Due Date:2/25/2010. Cash Flow Statement Due:2/25/2010. Exhibit D due: 2/25/2010. List of all creditors due 2/25/2010. Corporate Ownership Statement due by: 2/25/2010. Incomplete Filings due by 2/25/2010, Chapter 11 Plan due by 6/11/2010, Disclosure Statement due by 6/11/2010, Initial Case Conference due by 3/15/2010, Filed by Kevin J. Nash of Goldberg Weprin Finkel Goldstein LLP on behalf of Neviot Realty Holdings, LLC. (Nash, Kevin) (Entered: 02/11/2010)
